name: Racer Man
description: I am 11 and this is my game called Racer Man were you race against slow man, ally boy, and jet man it is free and you aren't probably not going to read this but if you are HELLO THERE if you beat jet man you da best if you tie with him you kinda da best. bowl dog goat hair stole pop yo boy nag dank dab hello if you found you da best. The controls are up arrow is jump, right arrow is forward, and left arrow is backward.
